frameDefinitions: There is a gradable amount of light in a particular Location.
A Controlling_entity has control of a Dependent_entity, Dependent_situation, or Dependent_variable.
A Recipient comes into possession of the Theme as a result of the joint action of the Donor and the Recipient.
These words refer to Parts merging to form a Whole.
A Speaker addresses a Proposal made by an Interlocutor, either agreeing to it or rejecting it.
frameExamples: The small print was bearly readable by the light of the very <t>dim</t> torch.
She was in <t>control</t> of the empire within two days.
I <t>recieved</t> a box from him in the mail.
The two droplets <t>merge</t>, and then travel down the windowpane even faster.
They were <t>rebuffed</t> again in the larger city of Provo. CNI
listRoleDefinitions: The event that elicits a <fen>Response</fen>.
The means action or judgement in response to the <fen>Trigger</fen>.
The point in time when <fen>Response</fen> is made to the <fen>Trigger</fen>.
The location in which the <fen>Response</fen> action takes place.
The place whose amout of light is being described.  The <fen>Location</fen> can also be a location in time, as seen in the second example below:
The entity from which the light eminates.
A thing or person whose behavior controls a <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>, <fen>Dependent_situation</fen>, or <fen>Dependent_variable</fen>.
An entity, usually a thing, that is influenced in its behavior by a <fen>Controlling_entity</fen>.
A situation whose temporal or other characteristics are influenced by a <fen>Controlling_entity</fen>.
A scalar variable, whose value depends on the behavior of a <fen>Controlling_entity</fen>.
The <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Controlling_entity</fen> effects the <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the controlling occurs.
The location at which the controlling occurs.
The person who acts to come into possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The person who gives the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Recipient</fen>.
The entity that changes possession, beginning in the possession of the <fen>Donor</fen> and ending up with the <fen>Recipient</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Recipient</fen> comes into possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The location at which the Recipient comes into possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The entities that merge to form a single <fen>Whole</fen>.
The single, undifferentiated entity that is the result of the amalgamation.
The prominent entity that combines with <fen>Part_2</fen> to form a <fen>Whole</fen>.
The less focussed-upon entity that the <fen>Part_1</fen> merges with.
The time at which the <fen>Parts</fen> become amalgamated into a <fen>Whole</fen>
The location at which the amalgamation occurs.
The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who communicates the reply or response.

This is the person who made the <fen>Proposal</fen> to the <fen>Speaker</fen> and to whom the <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates  their response. This frame element stands in for the <fen>Proposal</fen> and is only licensed when the <fen>Proposal</fen>  can be understood from the context.
The <fen>Proposal</fen> is the prior communication or action to which a response is given.
The time interval during which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes their verbal response.
The location in which the <fen>Speaker</fen>  makes a verbal response.
listRoleExamples: She hid from the man in a dark <fex>corner</fex>.
A dim <fex>lamp</fex> swung over the entrance to the castle.
Move the slider on the SpeedBar while playing audio or video material to control <fex>playback speed</fex>.
She received the package <fex>before the month was out</fex>.
They had all just merged <fex>into one big file</fex>.
<fex>The single smaller soul</fex> merges with the Ur-soul.
The single smaller soul merges <fex>with the Ur-soul</fex>.
<fex>Iran</fex> on Saturday rejected Europe's proposal for ending the standoff over Tehran's nuclear program.

But senior SLN officials had rebuffed <fex>the man who is ever so willing to please
the guerrillas</fex>.
Dr. Carolyn Herrington has accepted <fex>our offer to become Dean of the College of Education</fex> .
This must make <fex>yesterday's</fex> Taliban rebuff all the more wounding.
Legislation that would have required smaller school districts to share administrators has been rebuffed repeatedly <fex>in the Oklahoma House of Representatives</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: God's Only Son: The Translation of John 3:16 in the Revised Standard Version
The Making of a Contemporary Translation
